bike.description: Reynolds 853 heat-treated, seamless air-hardened chromoly main tubes, SST tubing diameters, sloping top tube design, double-tapered heat-treated stays, reinforced head tube collars, Ritchey lost wax socket dropouts

components.description: Jamis full carbon fiber with forged alloy dropouts
Ritchey WCS Zeta wheelset, 20/24H, 24mm Vanadium aero rims, WCS hubs with German stainless steel cartridge bearings and Sapim CX/CX-Ray bladed stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
Shimano Ultegra RD-6700 rear and Ultegra FD-6700 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST-6700 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Shimano Ultegra BR-6700 Super SLR dual pivot calipers with cartridge pads and Shimano Ultegra ST-6700 STI brake levers
Ritchey WCS Logic Curve, 7075 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56) 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro 4 Axis, 3D net forged 2014 alloy. 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey WCS 1 Bolt, 27.2 x 300mm with cromo seatpin
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil cover and hollow chromoly rails
